instance.context:
Styka blew his nose again . `` Were you able to make the arrangements '' ? Andrei asked . `` There is a man named Grabski who is the foreman in_charge_of the
bricklayers at Majdanek . I did exactly as instructed . I told him you are on orders from the Home_Army to get inside Majdanek so you can make a report to the government_in_exile in London '' . `` His answer '' ?
